RKHTRCFG_T Struct Reference

Specifies the behavior of the instrumented state-machine. More...

#include <rkhtrace.h>

Data Fields

unsigned enable:1
unsigned print:1
unsigned log:1
unsigned res:5

Detailed Description

Specifies the behavior of the instrumented state-machine.

The members of this structure can be set through rkh_trcontrol() function.

Definition at line 440 of file rkhtrace.h.

Field Documentation

unsigned RKHTRCFG_T::enable

When enabling tracing for a state-machine, trace module records the trace events.

Definition at line 447 of file rkhtrace.h.

unsigned RKHTRCFG_T::log

This number isn't internally used by RKH trace module.
